Actions.Text: REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

Title: Relates to authorizing certain legislators to visit office of mental health and office for people with developmental disabilities facilities
Summary: Relates to authorizing certain legislators, clergymen and ministers to visit office of mental health and office for people with developmental disabilities facilities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to authorizing certain legislators to visit office of mental health and office for people with developmental disabilities operated and certified facilities
